snippet: Massoud Mosavi, 7, and his family were deported from Norway. But he speaks Norwegian and English, and remembers nothing of his native country....

byline.contributor: Fahim Abed and Zahra Nader contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Massoud Mosavi, 7, and his family were deported from Norway. But he speaks Norwegian and English, and remembers nothing of his native country.

headline.main: A Deported Afghan Boy Returns to a Land Nothing Like Home
headline.print_headline: Afghan Boy Returns to a Land Nothing Like Home
